version_description: No one likes being bothered to update the app when you have the latest and freshest build! We fixed that.
No one likes being bothered to update the app when you have the latest and freshest build! We fixed that.

Flipgrid is all-new with everything you love and much more! An updated interface, shiny new recorder, fun selfie stickers and drawings, enhanced video playback … the list goes on!

- Selfie styling: You can now personalize your videos and express your creativity through stickers and drawings on your video selfies.
- Links and titles: Add context and broaden the discussion by adding titles and project links to your response videos.
- Topic resources: Educators can now add images, animated gifs, emojis, and attachments to add fun, context, and depth to your topics.
- Video reactions: Go beyond simply liking videos and use our new reactions to express your opinions with a single tap.
- In-app QR reader: Simply point your camera at a QR code to access your grids, topics, and responses with ease.
- Grid notifications: See which of your recent grids have new topics and videos waiting for you.

Flipgrid is all-new with everything you love and much more! An updated interface, shiny new recorder, fun selfie stickers and drawings, enhanced video playback … the list goes on!

- Selfie styling: You can now personalize your videos and express your creativity through stickers and drawings on your video selfies.
- Links and titles: Add context and broaden the discussion by adding titles and project links to your response videos.
- Topic resources: Educators can now add images, animated gifs, emojis, and attachments to add fun, context, and depth to your topics.
- Video reactions: Go beyond simply liking videos and use our new reactions to express your opinions with a single tap.
- In-app QR reader: Simply point your camera at a QR code to access your grids, topics, and responses with ease.
- Grid notifications: See which of your recent grids have new topics and videos waiting for you.
Making the all-new Flipgrid as perfect as possible.
Making the all-new Flipgrid as perfect as possible.

New
- Canvas users can now view and record videos via the app
- Bug fixes and improvements

New
- Canvas users can now view and record videos via the app
- Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.
We’ve added a new set of stickers and a brand new sticker picker to the video recorder. Decorating your awesome video just got a lot easier!
We’ve added a new set of stickers and a brand new sticker picker to the video recorder. Decorating your awesome video just got a lot easier!

- Introducing Ideas: an open space for students to share quick, impromptu ideas with their classmates on current events, announcements, class assignments, or anything!
- Video playback fixes and improvements

- Introducing Ideas: an open space for students to share quick, impromptu ideas with their classmates on current events, announcements, class assignments, or anything!
- Video playback fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

- We know it can be quite tedious to enter your personal deets every time you submit a video. Now you can set your profile (first name, last name, and email address) and the submission step will be pre-populated with your information.
- Response and reply playback got a nice little makeover. Reply to videos and show off that horizontal scrolling dexterity.
- Other minor (but pretty awesome) bug fixes and improvements.

- We know it can be quite tedious to enter your personal deets every time you submit a video. Now you can set your profile (first name, last name, and email address) and the submission step will be pre-populated with your information.
- Response and reply playback got a nice little makeover. Reply to videos and show off that horizontal scrolling dexterity.
- Other minor (but pretty awesome) bug fixes and improvements.

- All new video recorder with the ability to flip between the front and back cameras without pausing!
- We gave our Response and Topic lists some nice polish, you're gonna like what you see.
- Other minor (but pretty awesome) bug fixes and improvements.

- All new video recorder with the ability to flip between the front and back cameras without pausing!
- We gave our Response and Topic lists some nice polish, you're gonna like what you see.
- Other minor (but pretty awesome) bug fixes and improvements.

- World language captioning is here! Flipgrid now offers support for 110 languages and dialects.
- Improved video playback performance.
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

- World language captioning is here! Flipgrid now offers support for 110 languages and dialects.
- Improved video playback performance.
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

- We’ve got a new, slick code entry screen to highlight your awesome grids!
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

- We’ve got a new, slick code entry screen to highlight your awesome grids!
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

- Forget something important you wanted to say in the middle of recording? You can now organize your thoughts with Stickies on the iPad app.
- Stay up to date with our new feature notifications!
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

- Bug fixes and improvements.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

-We’ve completely updated the Flipgrid interface making it easier to search, browse, and record!
-The video recorder has a new look with all-new features. You can now double-tap to flip the camera in real-time (awesome, right?!) and audio recording has been improved.
-Improved app performance and stability.

-We’ve completely updated the Flipgrid interface making it easier to search, browse, and record!
-The video recorder has a new look with all-new features. You can now double-tap to flip the camera in real-time (awesome, right?!) and audio recording has been improved.
-Improved app performance and stability.
We fixed a problem where some were having difficulties accessing password-protected Grids. We’re really sorry about that... It was us and not your password.

- Videos now *automagically* appear in your Topic once they’ve been submitted. No need to even refresh. Voila!
- We've added super-smooth animations throughout the app--making Flipgrid even more fun to use!
- There were a few pesky bugs, but they've been squashed!
We fixed a problem where some were having difficulties accessing password-protected Grids. We’re really sorry about that... It was us and not your password.

- Videos now *automagically* appear in your Topic once they’ve been submitted. No need to even refresh. Voila!
- We've added super-smooth animations throughout the app--making Flipgrid even more fun to use!

- A few little improvements that should be completely transparent to the user. Pay no attention to that man behind the curtain.

- Our recorder is now faster, smoother, and sleeker than ever before.
- Want to quickly close out of a Response? Simply pull down to dismiss!

Flipgrid 7.0 is here!
- Accessing your Grids is now easier than ever with the new Grid Launch Pad! You can now get to your Grids without needing to enter a password every time!
- The video recorder has been updated to make creating and sharing videos easier and more fun with new features like video trimming and add more.
- Have fun recording in multiple orientations that can be experienced by others with MyView!
- Plus so much more! Explore Flipgrid to experience all the awesome updates.

Flipgrid 7.0 is here!
- Accessing your Grids is now easier than ever with the new Grid Launch Pad! You can now get to your Grids without needing to enter a password every time!
- The video recorder has been updated to make creating and sharing videos easier and more fun with new features like video trimming and add more.
- Have fun recording in multiple orientations that can be experienced by others with MyView!
- Plus so much more! Explore Flipgrid to experience all the awesome updates.

Introducing the All-New Flipgrid!
- Jump right into the showcase Topic after entering your educator's Flip Code and tap the green plus to add your voice.
- Creating a compelling and enriching story is simple and fun with the brand new Flipgrid Camera.
- Show your creative flair by adding live inking, styles, emojis, stickers, and text to your videos.
- Create a story with unlimited segments, trim, and imported clips.

Fix VoiceOver crash.
Fix VoiceOver crash.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

- Nobody likes failing uploads! So, we fixed a few issues that would cause video uploads to get "stuck" and fail to complete.
- Use Closed Captions? We now remember whether you prefer them on or off and will now show them more consistently when appropriate.
- To keep your experience running smoothly, we made some under-the-hood optimizations and improvements.

- Nobody likes failing uploads! So, we fixed a few issues that would cause video uploads to get "stuck" and fail to complete.
- Use Closed Captions? We now remember whether you prefer them on or off and will now show them more consistently when appropriate.
- To keep your experience running smoothly, we made some under-the-hood optimizations and improvements.
This is just a minor update to keep everything running smoothly.
This is just a minor update to keep everything running smoothly.

- Brighten up your videos and selfies with the new rainbow pen!
- Record without audio is back! Remove background noise when signing or just get a little creative!

- Brighten up your videos and selfies with the new rainbow pen!
- Record without audio is back! Remove background noise when signing or just get a little creative!

Whether on a bulletin board in a school hallway, inside the cover of a National Park Junior Ranger booklet, or posted to a service door on the ISS in outer space... no matter where you put your Flipgrid AR, we'll be there with a faster and more reliable experience.

Whether on a bulletin board in a school hallway, inside the cover of a National Park Junior Ranger booklet, or posted to a service door on the ISS in outer space... no matter where you put your Flipgrid AR, we'll be there with a faster and more reliable experience.

Like a car needs an oil change or how you go to the doctor for routine check-ups, Flipgrid also benefits from routinely tightening the screws and taking our daily multivitamin. This release contains a bunch of small fixes and improvements that do just that.

Notably, we added title and attachments to replies. Also, the upload success screen now contains the private share link to your video so you can better share your voice!

Like a car needs an oil change or how you go to the doctor for routine check-ups, Flipgrid also benefits from routinely tightening the screws and taking our daily multivitamin. This release contains a bunch of small fixes and improvements that do just that.

Notably, we added title and attachments to replies. Also, the upload success screen now contains the private share link to your video so you can better share your voice!

Our New Years resolutions was to give our camera a makeover so that you get the best canvas to share your voices!

What’s that I hear?! Just the DJ spinning some of the greatest hits of 2019! What else is spinning...? Your clips?! We’ve added the ability for you to rotate your clips! Combine portrait and landscape clips seamlessly into your masterpiece!

Love decorating your video? Don’t let the edge of your device stop you! We now display 100% of the recorded video in the preview so you can make sure you are pixel perfect!

Also, Happy New Year from all of us at Flipgrid!

Also, Happy New Year from all of us at Flipgrid!

A few bug fixes to our latest awesome Flipgrid update.

- In our continued effort to make Flipgrid inclusive to all users, we've added closed captions to AR videos in fullscreen mode.
- Additionally, we have revamped our help and support section to better assist in getting started with information that is now personalized to you! Find the support section in the menu on the code input screen, along with new menu options to assist you in common behaviors many of you may do daily.

As always, feel free to reach out to us at support@flipgrid.com

- In our continued effort to make Flipgrid inclusive to all users, we've added closed captions to AR videos in fullscreen mode.
- Additionally, we have revamped our help and support section to better assist in getting started with information that is now personalized to you! Find the support section in the menu on the code input screen, along with new menu options to assist you in common behaviors many of you may do daily.

As always, feel free to reach out to us at support@flipgrid.com

Before we get into it, let's start with a brain teaser! (Answer at the end)

If:
2 + 2 = 44
3 + 3 = 96
4 + 4 = 168
5 + 5 = 2510

Then…
6 + 6 = ?

Now, let’s get into it! Here is what is new and improved in this release:
• We’ve improved the “Select A Frame” option on the selfie step to allow you more creativity and speed in creating your cover!
• Some of you may have experienced playback issues that were resolved by refreshing the feed view. NO MORE! We’ve fixed that.
• Are you a power user who imports clips?! You’ll enjoy the updates we’ve made to add reliability and stability to clip importing!

Finally the answer!

So, 6 + 6 would equal 3612! The formula is to combine the result of the two numbers multiplied together and added together! So 6 * 6 = 36 and 6 + 6 = 12. Then we combine 36 and 12 for 3612!

Did you get it?!

Before we get into it, let's start with a brain teaser! (Answer at the end)

If:
2 + 2 = 44
3 + 3 = 96
4 + 4 = 168
5 + 5 = 2510

Then…
6 + 6 = ?

Now, let’s get into it! Here is what is new and improved in this release:
• We’ve improved the “Select A Frame” option on the selfie step to allow you more creativity and speed in creating your cover!
• Some of you may have experienced playback issues that were resolved by refreshing the feed view. NO MORE! We’ve fixed that.
• Are you a power user who imports clips?! You’ll enjoy the updates we’ve made to add reliability and stability to clip importing!

Finally the answer!

So, 6 + 6 would equal 3612! The formula is to combine the result of the two numbers multiplied together and added together! So 6 * 6 = 36 and 6 + 6 = 12. Then we combine 36 and 12 for 3612!

Did you get it?!

Hey! Hi! Its us again, inside your phone!

We love Flipgrid AR… so we decided to LIVE IN AR FOREVER! (Can you tell our friends and families we are doing great in here?!)

While we were living here we decided to make some renovations to spruce the place up. Check out below for some of our updates!
• Added status alerts below the viewfinder so you always know the progress of your AR video.
• Have a long AR video and you want to skip to your favorite part? You can now scrub and seek your AR videos!
• Flipgrid AR loading speeds are now faster than ever.
• Enjoying a good tune?! Flipgrid will no longer stop your music from playing when using the app.

Nothing fancy here. just a small update today:
• Fixed an issue with grid authentication
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

Nothing fancy here. just a small update today:
• Fixed an issue with grid authentication
• Additional bug fixes and improvements

We don't want to make you wait when scrolling through the amazing videos shared on Flipgrid, so we made big improvements to make them load FASTER THAN EVER!

We also made smaller fixes and improvements across the app to make sure EVERYONE can better share their voice with Flipgrid.

We don't want to make you wait when scrolling through the amazing videos shared on Flipgrid, so we made big improvements to make them load FASTER THAN EVER!

We also made smaller fixes and improvements across the app to make sure EVERYONE can better share their voice with Flipgrid.

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Your community doesn't need to be together to learn together.
Reach out to us and the amazing Flipgrid community on social media by tagging @Flipgrid or #FlipgridFever!

In this update:
• Clip Recovery! If something should happen while you are recording a response, we now automatically save your clips and trim points so you can pick right back up where you left off.
• We fixed an issue that could occasionally cause a delay in loading replies.

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Your community doesn't need to be together to learn together.
Reach out to us and the amazing Flipgrid community on social media by tagging @Flipgrid or #FlipgridFever!

In this update:
• Clip Recovery! If something should happen while you are recording a response, we now automatically save your clips and trim points so you can pick right back up where you left off.
• We fixed an issue that could occasionally cause a delay in loading replies.

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Your community doesn't need to be together to learn together!

On to the good stuff... In this update:
- New to Flipgrid? Quickly access the "Quick Start Guide" your first time in the app.
- We are continuing to build on the Educator experience, this time with stability improvements!

Follow @Flipgrid on Twitter or Instagram to see how our amazing community shares their voices!

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Your community doesn't need to be together to learn together!

On to the good stuff... In this update:
- New to Flipgrid? Quickly access the "Quick Start Guide" your first time in the app.
- We are continuing to build on the Educator experience, this time with stability improvements!

Follow @Flipgrid on Twitter or Instagram to see how our amazing community shares their voices!

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Whether remote learning with your classmates or learning in the home, your community can share videos together from anywhere!

To continue making Flipgrid even better, here is what we included in this update:
• Welcome screen improvements
• Improved messaging throughout the recording flow

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Whether remote learning with your classmates or learning in the home, your community can share videos together from anywhere!

Latest updates include:
- Enhanced prompts for each step while recording. Don't forget that selfie!

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Whether remote learning with your classmates or learning in the home, your community can share videos together from anywhere!

This amazing update to Flipgrid includes:
- Storytelling: We've added new storytelling tools so you can customize the font, color, and text options to share your voice
- Recent Stickers: We know how much time it can take to search for the perfect sticker, so we've made it super-convenient for you to quickly and easily apply your recents stickers to your masterpiece.

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Whether remote learning with your classmates or learning in the home, your community can share videos together from anywhere!

This amazing update to Flipgrid includes:
- Storytelling: We've added new storytelling tools so you can customize the font, color, and text options to share your voice
- Recent Stickers: We know how much time it can take to search for the perfect sticker, so we've made it super-convenient for you to quickly and easily apply your recents stickers to your masterpiece.

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Whether remote learning with your classmates or learning in the home, your community can share videos together from anywhere!

We are excited to release all new functionality to amplify your voice!
- Sticker Actions: Stickers and text added to your videos can now be further customized with mirroring, layering, and deleting. We also gave undo/redo a power-up for even smaller-grained changes.
- FlipgridAR Improvements: We refreshed the design and speed of FlipgridAR to continue to improve on the immersive experience.
- In-App Settings Menu: Customize your app experience to the way you use Flipgrid. Add a default display name, choose to auto-save your responses before uploading, and much more!

Flipgrid is simple. Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Whether remote learning with your classmates or learning in the home, your community can share videos together from anywhere!

We are excited to release all new functionality to amplify your voice!
- Sticker Actions: Stickers and text added to your videos can now be further customized with mirroring, layering, and deleting. We also gave undo/redo a power-up for even smaller-grained changes.
- FlipgridAR Improvements: We refreshed the design and speed of FlipgridAR to continue to improve on the immersive experience.
- In-App Settings Menu: Customize your app experience to the way you use Flipgrid. Add a default display name, choose to auto-save your responses before uploading, and much more!

We are excited to release the all-new Flipgrid, packed with new features and functionality requested by the Flipgrid community!
· Enhanced Storytelling: We’ve taken the amazing feedback from our community to build a camera centered on creativity and storytelling! The possibilities are endless with updated filters and boards. Plus, we added brand-new video frames and animated GIFs!
· New look: The Flipgrid experience has been revamped to make creating, sharing, and viewing videos easier and more enjoyable. Videos take center stage with our new player and our new viewing experience makes it easier than ever to kickstart discussions.
· Flipgrid AR: We’ve taken what was already magical and created a new experience that is faster and more immersive.
· Tailored experience: Customize your Flipgrid experience to what fits you. Auto-save your videos, add your custom display name, and much more.
· Easier Topic access: We’ve made it easier than ever for students to quickly take part in a discussion. Simply enter a Join Code, record a video, and share!

· We made improvements to ensure you can successfully get into your topics and groups.
· We now hide the video controls until you tap, to give you the full picture right off the bat!
· We also made some under the hood changes to continue improving the Flipgrid experience.

We are excited to continue to build on the all-new Flipgrid experience by bringing you fixes and improvements based on YOUR amazing suggestions and needs.

In this release:
· Entering certain Join Codes no longer fails to open your Group.
· Editing your display name when submitting a Response is no longer overridden by your saved display name from the Settings page.
· Pulling to refresh your Topic now works more reliably.
· Your newly-created Responses are successfully shown to you in its Topic right away.
· Recording a Response on iPads won't incorrectly appear as a Comment to another Response.
· We made more under the hood improvements to keep Flipgrid running smooth!

We are excited to continue to build on the all-new Flipgrid experience by bringing you fixes and improvements based on YOUR amazing suggestions and needs.

· Entering certain Join Codes no longer fails to open your Group.

In this release, Response videos always expand to the full width of your phone without any letterboxing for a more immersive experience.

In this release we are introducing Text Comments! Once your Educators enable this feature, you will be able to leave a text-based comment on a classmate’s video instead of needing to record a video reply.

We also made a few adjustments to other parts of the app that will improve your overall experience, including:
· Video uploads are more reliable and error messages appear when appropriate.
· Responses can be recorded within private Topics that belong to public Groups.
· Camera permissions are always checked before scanning a Flipgrid QR code.

We are excited to continue to build on the all-new Flipgrid experience by bringing you fixes and improvements based on YOUR amazing suggestions and needs.

In this release:
· A "New" banner shows on your recent Topics and Groups to indicate when new content available to view!
· Real-time updates allow you to see new Responses and Comments as they are posted.
· The all-new "Nametag" feature provides you with another way to quickly add a cover photo to your video.
· The Comments drawer has been improved and is now more responsive.
· Topic banners now consistently load.
· An error that could prevent you from opening the recorder is now fixed.

Introducing Mic only mode: Whether learners are podcasting or simply a bit camera shy, they can now choose to enable an audio-only recording while still accessing the full Flipgrid creative suite of boards, live inking, styles and emojis!

· You will now see a grid layout of Response previews on iPhones just like on iPads. Tap on the response to quickly jump to your favorite videos!
